long_description: Featuring durable fiberglass blades on a fiberglass shaft, the Werner Baja Kayak Paddle offers high-quality materials at an introductory price. Wrapped fiberglass shaft feels comfortable to the touch even in cold temperatures; durable construction stands up to long hours on the water. Durable fiberglass-reinforced nylon composite blades deliver lightweight power and long-lasting performance, and midsize blades fit a wide range of paddlers. Werner Baja Kayak Paddle features drip rings to help keep hands and lap dry. Push-button ferrule adjustment adjusts from 0deg - 45deg right or left. Design is optimized for low-angle paddling style. 2-piece design breaks down quickly and eases transport and storage.
short_description: Featuring durable fiberglass blades on a fiberglass shaft, the Werner Baja Kayak Paddle offers high-quality materials at an introductory price.
